missing_implementations: Upon execution, the program successfully connects to https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users and retrieves user data.
The program outputs or makes available all user records as returned by the API.
The program handles and reports any connection or retrieval errors.
The program must establish an HTTP connection to the JSONPlaceholder API at the base URL: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com.
The program must send a GET request to the /users endpoint to retrieve all user records.
The program must process the response and extract user information as defined by the API specification.
The program must display or make available the retrieved user information for further operations or integrations.
The program must reliably and efficiently fetch user information.
The program must handle network errors or API unavailability gracefully (e.g., by reporting errors to the user).
